title: Raging child
body:
When you beat a kid in lane

http://imgur.com/a/R1UFx

replies.body:
1. Did I ever say I don't like him flaming?
2. Why would I remove my name from the image if I am revealing it on the boards? 
3. I didn't even add him, he added me I had no idea who he was off the top of my head
4. Honestly thought this shit was funny. But I can see in this board section they take shit too seriously lol

> [{quoted}](name=nochillgamer,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=rmto0izz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-22T06:09:08.661+0000)
>
> 2 Why would I remove my name from the image if I am revealing it on the boards? 

I don't mean your in-game name, but that which seems to be your real name on the top right corner. Just that usually for security reasons, I'd generally advice people not to reveal their real name, in full, too easily.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=rmto0izz,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-12-22T06:12:40.582+0000)
>
> I don't mean your in-game name, but that which seems to be your real name on the top right corner. Just that usually for security reasons, I'd generally advice people not to reveal their real name, in full, too easily.

Actually that is my grandfather's name, this was his old computer. I only play on this computer sometimes but yeah thanks for clarifying

Me: Holy shit, who the hell still uses QuickTime player? Wow.

Me: Oops, nvm, Mac.

...................

Also, for security reasons, wipe off your name maybe.

If you don't like him flaming, don't add him :P
Also for security maybe remove your name from image.
